Operation 'getHTML' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Original summary 'Page HTML by URL' is too vague and doesn't clearly indicate the action. Enhanced summary to be more action-oriented. Description improved by clarifying that the URL is a required parameter and emphasizing the benefit of JavaScript rendering for dynamic content, which helps AI agents understand when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Returns the full HTML content of a webpage specified by the URL. The response is in plain text. Proxies and Chromium JavaScript rendering are used for page retrieval and processing.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve full HTML content of a webpage
data.description_suggestion: Returns the complete HTML content of a webpage specified by the URL parameter. Proxies and Chromium JavaScript rendering are used for page retrieval and processing, enabling access to dynamically-rendered content. The response is returned as plain text HTML.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Page HTML by URL' is too vague and doesn't clearly indicate the action. Enhanced summary to be more action-oriented. Description improved by clarifying that the URL is a required parameter and emphasizing the benefit of JavaScript rendering for dynamic content, which helps AI agents understand when to use this operation.

message: Operation 'getSelected' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is passive and unclear about the action. Enhanced to be action-oriented. Description lacked clarity about required parameters, processing pipeline, and return format. Improved version specifies input requirements, processing method, output structure (array of matched elements), and use case benefits for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: HTML of a selected page area by URL and CSS selector
data.current_description: Returns HTML of a selected page area by URL and CSS selector. Useful if you don't want to do the HTML parsing on your side.
data.summary_suggestion: Extract HTML from selected page area using CSS selector
data.description_suggestion: Returns HTML content of a specific page area selected by CSS selector. Requires URL and CSS selector parameters. Proxies and Chromium JavaScript rendering are used for page retrieval and processing. Returns an array of matched elements. Eliminates the need for client-side HTML parsing by providing pre-selected content.
data.reasoning: Original summary is passive and unclear about the action. Enhanced to be action-oriented. Description lacked clarity about required parameters, processing pipeline, and return format. Improved version specifies input requirements, processing method, output structure (array of matched elements), and use case benefits for AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: HTML of multiple page areas by URL and CSS selectors
data.current_description: Returns HTML of multiple page areas by URL and CSS selectors. Useful if you don't want to do the HTML parsing on your side.
data.summary_suggestion: Extract HTML from multiple page areas using CSS selectors
data.description_suggestion: Returns HTML content of multiple specific page areas selected by CSS selectors. Requires URL and an array of CSS selector parameters. Proxies and Chromium JavaScript rendering are used for page retrieval and processing. Returns an array of matched elements for each selector. Eliminates the need for client-side HTML parsing by providing pre-selected content from multiple locations.
